definition: secret society/underworld gang
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society

sentences.english: ‘He’s a gangster involved in organised crime.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個參與幫會犯罪的惡棍。

sentences.english: Because join underworld gang, kelina is thrown into jail to be sentenced 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 因爲加入幫會，柯里南身陷囹圄被判刑20年。

sentences.english: The group eventually split into three segments, relegating distinct roles and tasks.
sentences.chinese: 幫會最終分裂成三個陣營，歸入不同的任務和角色。

sentences.english: A gang of criminals Gang membership and gang-related crime is primarily a juvenile problem.
sentences.chinese: 幫會和幫派罪行從根本上說是青少年問題。
